profile.intro: I’m a Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience building backend and full-stack applications using Java, Spring Boot, Python, and React. I enjoy designing reliable REST APIs, optimizing data pipelines, and improving system performance through thoughtful engineering. I’ve worked on both startup and enterprise systems, handling everything from data ingestion and analytics backends to API integrations and dashboards. I’m driven by continuous learning, clean code, and building software that solves real-world problems at scale.
